condition.ab: The left hand side is badly damaged; as well as the right hand side is badly damaged at the top and right hand side. The fibers are frayed. Big portion is missing from the middle of the column downwards to the end. The beginning of the whole column is missing. The papyrus was horizontally folded few times, and few vertical. kollesis at the middle of the column., No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. Since it is of the same Tax Roll, we expect to see the same way of marking the new entry.
